constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 94 (Friday, May 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. ADAMS:
H.R. 3558.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H2678]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Army Security Agency Monument Act
